mutants.mutated_line: input_string = ''.join((char for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
input_string = ''.join((char for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))

mutants.original_line: input_string = ''.join(char for char in input_string if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: input_string = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
